trans-unit.source: Any argument not beeing a JavaScript object (including null) will be ignored. Except for the first argument, also DOM nodes are discarded. Beware that i.e. strings, created like new String() are in fact objects.
trans-unit.target: 任何不属于JavaScript对象的参数(包括null)都将被忽略。除了第一个参数外,DOM节点也会被丢弃。请注意,像new String()那样创建的字符串实际上是对象。

trans-unit.source: Based on Markus' and vsync' answer, this is an expanded version. The function takes any number of arguments. It can be used to set properties on DOM nodes and makes deep copies of values. However, the first argument is given by reference.
trans-unit.target: 基于Markus和vsync的答案，这是扩展版本。该函数接受任意数量的参数。它可用于在DOM节点上设置属性并制作值的深层副本。但是，第一个参数是通过引用给出的。

trans-unit.source: I googled for code to merge object properties and ended up here. However since there wasn't any code for recursive merge I wrote it myself. (Maybe jQuery extend is recursive BTW?) Anyhow, hopefully someone else will find it useful as well.
trans-unit.target: 我在网上搜索了一下合并对象属性的代码,结果在这里找到了。但是因为没有任何递归合并的代码,所以我自己写的。(也许jQuery extend是递归的吧?)总之,希望别人也能找到有用的代码。

trans-unit.source: The Harmony ECMAScript 2015 (ES6) specifies Object.assign which will do this.
trans-unit.target: 在和谐的ECMAScript 2015年（ES6）指定 Object.assign 这将做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: The polyfill to support older browsers:
trans-unit.target: 支持旧版浏览器的polyfill ：

trans-unit.source: The Object.assign() method is used to copy the values of all enumerable own properties from one or more source objects to a target object.
trans-unit.target: Object.assign()方法用于将一个或多个源对象中的所有可枚举的自身属性的值复制到目标对象中。

trans-unit.source: The Object.assign() method is used to copy the values of all enumerable own properties from one or more source objects to a target object. It will return the target object.
trans-unit.target: Object.assign()方法用于将一个或多个源对象中的所有可数的自身属性的值复制到目标对象中。它将返回目标对象。

trans-unit.source: The above code will mutate the existing object named settings.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码将使现有对象命名为 settings 。

trans-unit.source: The best way for you to do this is to add a proper property that is non-enumerable using Object.defineProperty.
trans-unit.target: 最好的方法是使用Object.defineProperty添加一个适当的非数字属性。

trans-unit.source: The following two are probably a good starting point. lodash also has a customizer function for those special needs!
trans-unit.target: 下面这两个可能是一个很好的起点,LODASH也有一个自定义功能,适合那些有特殊需求的人使用!

trans-unit.source: The given solutions should be modified to check source.hasOwnProperty(property) in the for..in loops before assigning - otherwise, you end up copying the properties of the whole prototype chain, which is rarely desired...
trans-unit.target: 给定的解决方案应该修改为在分配之前在 for..in 循环中检查 source.hasOwnProperty(property) -否则，最终将复制整个原型链的属性，这是很少需要的...

trans-unit.source: The objects are merged from right to left, this means that objects which have identical properties as the objects to their right will be overriden.
trans-unit.target: 对象从右到左合并,这意味着与右边的对象具有相同属性的对象将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The portion that is commented out is optional .. it will simply skip arguments passed that are not objects (preventing errors).
trans-unit.target: 被注释出来的部分是可选的.....它只是跳过传递的不是对象的参数(防止错误)。

trans-unit.source: There's a library called deepmerge on GitHub: That seems to be getting some traction. It's a standalone, available through both the npm and bower package managers.
trans-unit.target: 有一个叫库 deepmerge 在GitHub上：这似乎是得到一些牵引。它是独立的，可通过npm和bower软件包管理器使用。

trans-unit.source: This is a new technology, part of the ECMAScript 2015 (ES6) standard. This technology's specification has been finalized, but check the compatibility table for usage and implementation status in various browsers.
trans-unit.target: 这是一项新技术,属于ECMAScript 2015(ES6)标准的一部分。该技术的规范已经最终确定,但在各种浏览器中的使用情况和实现情况请查看兼容性表。

trans-unit.source: This is how JavaScript objects area really merged: Only keys in the to object which are not objects themselves will be overwritten by from. Everything else will be really merged. Of course you can change this behaviour to not overwrite anything which exists like only if to[n] is undefined, etc...:
trans-unit.target: 这就是JavaScript对象区域真正合并的方式： from 只会覆盖 to 对象中不是对象本身的键。其他所有内容都将真正合并。当然，您可以更改此行为以不覆盖任何存在的东西，例如仅当 to[n] is undefined ，等等：

trans-unit.source: This method is for ES5 & Earlier - there are plenty of other answers addressing ES6.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用于ES5及更早版本 -还有很多其他答案可以解决ES6。

trans-unit.source: This way you will still be able to iterate over your objects properties without having the newly created "extend" that you would get if you were to create the property with Object.prototype.extend.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,你仍然能够迭代你的对象属性,而不会像使用Object.prototype.extend创建属性时那样,得到新创建的 "extend"。

trans-unit.target: 要检测DOM节点，请使用isDOMNode（）函数（请参阅堆栈溢出问题JavaScript isDOM —如何检查JavaScript对象是否为DOM对象？）
